channel.title: Need a good Auto curser
channel.description: I would like an auto curser that has random waits, Ben mouse and anti randoms. It is for the monk of zammy in varrock palace. If someone could make we could all be lvl 99 mages. Thx in advance.

item.title: Need a good Auto curser
item.dc:creator: @zamorak_stud zamorak stud
item.description:
@zamorak_stud wrote:

[scar]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Ban Yourself Fast!

Author = Ron from **************.com

Description = Use this script to ban yourself. This script works.

Version = .21 beta - fully tested and works, but I want to add more.

Date = July 8th, 2006

Comments = Use the Target on RuneScape, then while you are already

            logged in, run the script. The script will then minimize
            itself and will execute whatever you have setup Action
            to be.

Warning = This script WILL work. Please don’t use this on your main

            accounts.

/Script Info}

Program BanYourselfFast;

Const
// You will be banned by…
Action = ‘talk’; // talk or click

Var
WaitT, i : Integer;

// Procedure to send whatever the Msg is, presses Enter, and then waits.
Procedure SendThis(Msg : String);
Begin
SendKeys(Msg);
SendKeys(Chr(13));
Wait(WaitT);
End;

// Procedure to ban by talking by using SendKeys, no random waits, and
// by insulting Jagex.
// Suggestions needed on new things to say and more cuss words.
Procedure BanByTalk;
Begin
SendThis(‘jagex swcks’);

  SendThis('fwck swck spawnk asz fwck shyt');

  SendThis('andrew swcks bals');

  SendThis('runescape is gai');

  SendThis('report me report me fwcker');

  SendThis('you all eat shyt and also... cwnt prostetute howoker wh0re beitch');

  SendThis('FWCK YOU ALL!!!!');

  SendThis('autoing rules!!! AUTOING IS AWESOME!!!');

  SendThis('go to w double u w. yahoo . cee oh em for free porn');

  SendThis('kaitnieks will never die!!!');

  SendThis('hey everyone im a mod');

  SendThis('i macro, i multi login, i impersonate jagex');

  SendThis('i encourage others to break rules');

  SendThis('i block adverts, i ask for personal details, i misuse the official forums');

  SendThis('press alt+F4 for free items');

  SendThis('to start autoing on runescape go to w double u w. autoing on runescape . cee oh em');

  SendThis('i drop trade and share accounts');

  SendThis('andrew throws ball like a girl');

  SendThis('andrew is a nerd');

  SendThis('jagex have small bals and have no cex lives');

  SendThis('fagex jagex are fwcking ex jag offs and pedofiles');

  SendThis('jagex bowoger each other all day');

  SendThis('well ello der shyt face, oh sorry ''bout that love. i thought you were a mod');

  SendThis('mods become mods by sleeping with mods who fwck andrew');

  SendThis('jagex people can''t ban people cause their pwenus is too small');

  i := i+1;
  WriteLn('Said everything ' + IntToStr(i) + ' time.');

End;

// Procedure to ban by clicking by clicking on one spot 100s of 1000s of
// times with no waits or random mouse movements.
Procedure BanByClick;
Begin
ClickMouse(5, 5, true);
i := i+1;
WriteLn(‘Clicked on RuneScape ’ + IntToStr(i) + ’ time.’);
End;

Begin
// This is the wait interval between each sentence written.
WaitT := 5000;

 // Clears Debug Report.
 ClearDebug;

 // Minimizes SCAR.
 GetApplication.MINIMIZE;

 Wait(50);

 // When automatically minimized, the RS window isn't selected,
 // so we have this click on the RS window.
 ClickMouse(20, 20, true);

 // If Action equals 'talk' then...
 If (Action = 'talk') Then
 Begin
      // Repeat the procedure BanByTalk forever.
      Repeat
            BanByTalk;
      Until(False)
 End;

 // If Action equals 'click' then...
 If (Action = 'click') Then
 Begin
      // Repeat the procedure BanByClick forever.
      Repeat
            BanByClick;
      Until(False)
 End;

End.[/scar]

now its easier to use

Read full topic

item.title: Need a good Auto curser
item.dc:creator: @Daddy_BonBon Daddy BonBon
item.description:
@Daddy_BonBon wrote:

{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Ban Yourself Fast!

Author = Ron from **************.com

Description = Use this script to ban yourself. This script works.

Version = .21 beta - fully tested and works, but I want to add more.

Date = July 8th, 2006

Comments = Use the Target on RuneScape, then while you are already

            logged in, run the script. The script will then minimize
            itself and will execute whatever you have setup Action
            to be.

Warning = This script WILL work. Please don’t use this on your main

            accounts.

/Script Info}

Program BanYourselfFast;

Const
// You will be banned by…
Action = ‘talk’; // talk or click

Var
WaitT, i : Integer;

// Procedure to send whatever the Msg is, presses Enter, and then waits.
Procedure SendThis(Msg : String);
Begin
SendKeys(Msg);
SendKeys(Chr(13));
Wait(WaitT);
End;

// Procedure to ban by talking by using SendKeys, no random waits, and
// by insulting Jagex.
// Suggestions needed on new things to say and more cuss words.
Procedure BanByTalk;
Begin
SendThis(‘jagex swcks’);

  SendThis('fwck swck spawnk asz fwck shyt');

  SendThis('andrew swcks bals');

  SendThis('runescape is gai');

  SendThis('report me report me fwcker');

  SendThis('you all eat shyt and also... cwnt prostetute howoker wh0re beitch');

  SendThis('FWCK YOU ALL!!!!');

  SendThis('autoing rules!!! AUTOING IS AWESOME!!!');

  SendThis('go to w double u w. yahoo . cee oh em for free porn');

  SendThis('kaitnieks will never die!!!');

  SendThis('hey everyone im a mod');

  SendThis('i macro, i multi login, i impersonate jagex');

  SendThis('i encourage others to break rules');

  SendThis('i block adverts, i ask for personal details, i misuse the official forums');

  SendThis('press alt+F4 for free items');

  SendThis('to start autoing on runescape go to w double u w. autoing on runescape . cee oh em');

  SendThis('i drop trade and share accounts');

  SendThis('andrew throws ball like a girl');

  SendThis('andrew is a nerd');

  SendThis('jagex have small bals and have no cex lives');

  SendThis('fagex jagex are fwcking ex jag offs and pedofiles');

  SendThis('jagex bowoger each other all day');

  SendThis('well ello der shyt face, oh sorry ''bout that love. i thought you were a mod');

  SendThis('mods become mods by sleeping with mods who fwck andrew');

  SendThis('jagex people can''t ban people cause their pwenus is too small');

  i := i+1;
  WriteLn('Said everything ' + IntToStr(i) + ' time[s].');

End;

// Procedure to ban by clicking by clicking on one spot 100s of 1000s of
// times with no waits or random mouse movements.
Procedure BanByClick;
Begin
ClickMouse(5, 5, true);
i := i+1;
WriteLn(‘Clicked on RuneScape ’ + IntToStr(i) + ’ time[s].’);
End;

Begin
// This is the wait interval between each sentence written.
WaitT := 5000;

 // Clears Debug Report.
 ClearDebug;

 // Minimizes SCAR.
 GetApplication.MINIMIZE;

 Wait(50);

 // When automatically minimized, the RS window isn't selected,
 // so we have this click on the RS window.
 ClickMouse(20, 20, true);

 // If Action equals 'talk' then...
 If (Action = 'talk') Then
 Begin
      // Repeat the procedure BanByTalk forever.
      Repeat
            BanByTalk;
      Until(False)
 End;

 // If Action equals 'click' then...
 If (Action = 'click') Then
 Begin
      // Repeat the procedure BanByClick forever.
      Repeat
            BanByClick;
      Until(False)
 End;

End.
